DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate possible impact two technique vaginal cuff closure robotic hysterectomy . We aim compare vertical v horizontal vaginal cuff closure impact techniques vaginal length , sexual function , overall complication rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial Comparing Horizontal Vertical Vaginal Cuff Closure
DOC.detailed_description: A Validated questionnaire Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) total vaginal length use evaluate patient pre-operatively , 4-6 week post-operatively , 6 month post operatively . The FSFI also send patient 12 month post operatively . These data use assess sexual function total vaginal length patient undergo minimally invasive hysterectomy . The study endpoint occur 12 month follow-up questionnaire . Additionally , complication follow surgery track study period comparison .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female premenopausal patient undergo robot assist total laparoscopic hysterectomy 1 . Adults unable consent 2 . Children age 18 3 . Pregnant woman 4 . Prisoners 5 . Postmenopausal woman 6 . Women know preoperative need bowel genitourinary surgery time hysterectomy 7 . Patients unable consent procedure English language
